Description: Foot and wall sherd of East Greek, possibly North Ionian, pottery bowl; disc foot; interior: wall glazed; reserved circle in tondo with red ring at centre; exterior and underside reserved save for band near bottom of wall; inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 171)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 656, no. 132)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.325)
